IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WE BUILD LEARNING COMMUNITIES WHERE RELIGIOUS DIFFERENCE BECOMES A POWERFUL FORCE FOR GOOD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WE BUILD LEARNING COMMUNITIES WHERE RELIGIOUS DIFFERENCE BECOMES A POWERFUL FORCE FOR GOOD.
IRS990.Desc: PROGRAMS PROVIDE ONGOING EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES TO ADULT LEARNERS, EDUCATORS, CLERGY, AND MEMBERS OF CHRISTIAN, JEWISH, AND MUSLIM CONGREGATIONS, LOCALLY AND REGIONALLY IN SUPPORT OF THE ICJS MISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 1, PART III, LINE 1A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COLLECTION OF BOOKS AND ARTWORK, VALUED AT APPROXIMATELY 54,250, THAT IS ON PUBLIC DISPLAY. THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED A POLICY OF NOT CAPITALIZING THE COLLECTION OF BOOKS AND ARTWORK IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. PURCHASES OF COLLECTION ITEMS REDUCE NET ASSETS IN THE PERIOD WHEN PURCHASED. PROCEEDS FROM SALES OR INSURANCE RECOVERIES ARE RECORDED AS INCREASES IN NET ASSETS WHEN RECEIVED.
THE BOARD REVIEWS A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 AT THEIR MEETINGS BEFORE THE RETURN IS FILED.
TRUSTEES AND KEY EMPLOYEES SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM WITH TRUSTEESHIP COMMITTEE REVIEW ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST , AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
